title: Digimon Ghost Game
synopsis: Sightings of mysterious creatures known as "Hologram Ghosts" have been a popular topic on social networks for the past few years. According to the rumors, several people have fallen victim to these specters. Those fortunate to survive their encounters with the paranormal beings claim that they resembled glitched holograms.
voices: ['Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Shimamura, Yuu', 'Tamura, Mutsumi']
